playFile: if (cmd == char + 'play' || cmd == char + 'p') { if (!args[1]) { msg.ch.sendMessage('Usage: `!play [song name]`'); return; } args.shift(); args = args.join(' '); args = args.toLowerCase(); var file = mp3[mp3.findIndex(function(i) { if (i.toLowerCase().indexOf(args) !== -1) { return true; } })]; log.log('Playing song: ' + file); if (!file) { msg.ch.sendMessage('404 File Not Found. ' + args); return; } vC.playFile('./mp3/' + file); msg.ch.sendMessage('Playing song: ' + file); }
